mapper.select: select re.id as request_id, re.request_intern_status, re.created_datetime as request_datetime, u.id as user_id, u.user_name, u.user_email, u.user_phone, inn.id as intern_notice_id, inn.intern_notice_title, inn.company_id from tbl_request_intern re join tbl_user u on re.member_id = u.id join tbl_intern_notice inn on re.intern_notice_id = inn.id where re.member_id = #{memberId} and inn.id = #{internNoticeId} order by re.id desc
